aiMessages.content: You're editing a Telegram bot project.
Project created from your prompt. Ask for features and I'll modify files.
can we add a section in the readme file for what the bot is about so you can explain
Added a section to the README file explaining what the bot is about.
This is a nodejs project and not a ts project, you can tell by the type of files created (js files). The package.json file commands  seem to be for a ts project, please make the changes for a nodejs
Updated package.json to reflect Node.js project structure and scripts.
